name: Paladin's Journey
description:
In this game, you play as a paladin, whose order has been at war with demons from the pits of hell for centuries. Travel across desolate lands of battles long lost, descend into the demons’ den, and reach the bottom of hell to stand alone against the demon lord, ending this war once and for all.

  • A focus on giving the player mechanical options that change the flow of the game, allowing for massive replayability
  • Fully focus on and perfect a single playstyle, or diversify your arsenal to have a tool for every situation
    • Three weapon types to upgrade and switch between
      • A sword, for fast-paced melee combat
      • A bow, for a slower and safer ranged approach
      • A staff, for a short-ranged radiant blast
  • Multiple approaches to gaining more power
    • Gain weapon upgrades at the end of each level
    • Gain additional upgrades depending on your playstyle
      • Additional upgrade rewarded for beating a level within a set time period
      • Additional upgrade rewarded for beating a level with at least a set score
  • Multiple enemy types, each with their own strategy to ruin your attempts
  • 5 unique levels, split across 3 areas

This game is set to release on December 4th, 2021 as part of the Florida Polytechnic University Game Expo.

Controls
A, D - Move left and right
W - Fall through certain platforms
Space - Jump
Shift - Dodge Dash
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Swap Weapons
